import React from "react" import virusimg from "../images/virus.jpg" class Home extends React.Component{ render(){ const {countryWise}=this.props return( <>

Corona cases Live Updates World Wide

Country

Total Confirmed

Total Recovered

Total Deaths

New Confirmed

New Recovered

Last Updated

{countryWise&& <> {countryWise.map((country)=>( <>

{country.Country}

{country.TotalConfirmed}

{country.TotalRecovered}

{country.TotalDeaths}

{country.NewConfirmed}

{country.NewRecovered}

{country.Date}

))} } ) } } export default Home;
